title: CPU Performance Architect - Platform Architecture
summary: Apple's Platform Architecture group defines high-performance power-efficient CPUs that power Apple Silicon. We are looking for an experienced CPU architect and technical leader for exploration and modeling of sophisticated CPU features, to lead and drive advanced development research that will enable our future CPU roadmap.
description:
-  Collaborate with the CPU micro-architecture and RTL team to find opportunities for product improvement and exploration
-  Analyze existing and emerging workloads to identify performance bottlenecks and opportunities
-  Work with cross-functional groups to identify CPU exploration areas of long-term strategic value to Apple
-  Work with other CPU leads to identify and evaluate potential architectural and ISA changes for targeted areas
-  Perform self-guided performance simulation studies of design alternatives while also providing guidance and direction to others on the architecture and modeling team
-  Work with RTL and design team to assess implementation cost for new features
-  Collaborate with performance team to maintain and improve the simulation environment for increased efficiency and productivity
key_qualifications:
Extensive experience in CPU architecture, design, or performance modeling
Strong technical leadership and collaboration skills
Strong CPU architecture knowledge, micro-architecture knowledge, and an understanding of competing architectures
Experience working in a performance modeling environment
Proficient in C and C++
Proficient in scripting languages such as Perl, Python and Ruby
Ability to tackle problems and prove your own ideas
Knowledge and experience with common performance benchmarks and workloads
Knowledge of OS internals and compiler technology a plus
education_experience: B.S. and a minimum of 20 years relevant industry experience.
